titleStmt.title: His Majesties most gracious speech to both Houses of Parliament, on Tuesday the seventh day of November, 1693
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the successors of Andrew Anderson, printers to Their Most Excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: A speech calling for an increase in the armed forces.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
